class.name: franka_interactive_controllers/JointGravityCompensationController
class.description: A controller that send 0 torques to the robot + coriolis + external tool compensation + nullspace tracking if desired. Nullspace stiffness can be modified onlive via dynamic reconfigure and external tool compensation forces should be defined in .yaml file in ./config folder.

class.name: franka_interactive_controllers/CartesianPoseImpedanceController
class.description: A controller that renders a spring damper system in cartesian space. Compliance parameters with the dynamic reconfigure and the desired/equilibrium pose can be modified online via an interactive marker or by publishing a geometry_msg Pose to "/cartesian_impedance_controller/desired_pose".

class.name: franka_interactive_controllers/CartesianTwistImpedanceController
class.description: A controller that renders a spring damper system in cartesian space. Gain parameters with the dynamic reconfigure and the desired twist can be modified by publishing a geometry_msg Twist to "/cartesian_impedance_controller/desired_twist".

class.name: franka_interactive_controllers/JointPositionFrankaController
class.description: CHANGE: A controller that executes a short motion based on joint positions to demonstrate correct usage

class.name: franka_interactive_controllers/JointVelocityFrankaController
class.description: CHANGE: A controller that executes a short motion based on joint velocities to demonstrate correct usage

class.name: franka_interactive_controllers/JointImpedanceFrankaController
class.description: CHANGE: A controller that tracks a cartesian path with a joint impedance controller that compensates coriolis torques. The torque commands are compared to measured torques in Console outputs.

class.name: franka_interactive_controllers/CartesianPoseFrankaController
class.description: CHANGE: A controller that executes a short motion based on cartesian poses to demonstrate correct usage

class.name: franka_interactive_controllers/CartesianVelocityFrankaController
class.description: CHANGE:A controller that executes a short motion based on cartesian velocities to demonstrate correct usage

class.name: franka_interactive_controllers/CartesianForceController
class.description: CHANGE: A PI controller that applies a force corresponding to a user-provided desired mass in the z axis. The desired mass value can be modified online with dynamic reconfigure.
